metadata.name: Together and apart
metadata.description:
Together and apart is my personal depiction of the turmoil many of us have lived through since 2020. 
When the pandemic broke out many were separated from family and friends for an unimaginably long period of our lives; unable to hug, touch, kiss or hold hands with loved ones. 
This image was taken off the coastline of Perth in Western Australia in July 2022. Early one morning whilst flying along the coast I came across a young couple walking hand in hand; enjoying the beauty of the world around them, whilst a solitary person strolled along the pier.  
Three years separated me from my family in Australia; longing to be that couple spending time with loved ones. 

License: The primary NFT owner is free to use in advertising, display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries and essays by holder of the NFT, as long as creator is credited. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Copyright remains with creators.
